remove_astronaut_contentText: Do you really want to REMOVE this astronaut?
about_subHeader: ShareShuttle - Know who got your shuttle dirty
about_description: This application is used for simple management of rented shuttles.
about_instruction: Make a record of each shuttle rental. Provide the following information for each tenant astronaut (hereinafter referred to just as the astronaut).
instruction_birth_desc: - enter the date in the prescribed format. You will see the format in the box where you enter the date.
instruction_superpower_desc: - state the superpower that the person has - maximum number of characters 50.
instruction_borrowed_desc: - enter the date in the prescribed format. You will see the format in the box where you enter the date.
instruction_returned_desc1: - if the shuttle is not returned,
instruction_returned_desc3: , otherwise it will not allow you to save the record.
instruction_note_desc: - optional - includes anything you think doesn't belong elsewhere. save the record.
disclaimer_description: The figures given are fictitious. Except for Elvis.
